name: 6th European Otolaryngology-ENT Surgery Conference
content: The 6th edition of European Otolaryngology-ENT Surgery Conference will be organized in Paris, France, from March 24-26, 2021 following the successful previous editions of Ent 2020 (Webinar) Italy 2019, London 2018, Italy 2017, and Alicante 2016\. ENT 2021 which aims to gather the most elegant societies and industries along with the renowned and honorable persons form top universities across the globe. ENT 2021 on behalf of its organizing Committee welcomes all the Otolaryngology researchers, industrialists, doctors, young scientists as well as student and corporate delegates to participate and to have a great experience. The theme of the conference is “Current issues and Research updates in diagnosis and treatment of ENT disorders”.
